item.title: Jimmy Kimmel had to answer to the FCC. Internet comedians answer to the algorithm.
item.dc:creator: Tatum Hunter
item.description: On social media, some comedians have audiences larger than network TV – and new pressures to navigate.

item.title: U.S. government scrambles to stop new hacking campaign blamed on China
item.dc:creator: Joseph Menn
item.description: U.S. cybersecurity officials ordered civilian federal agencies to check for vulnerable Cisco equipment being exploited by attackers targeting the government.

item.title: Trump’s ‘all American’ TikTok deal gives big stake to Middle East investors
item.dc:creator: Drew Harwell
item.description: An Emirati state-backed investment firm that boosted President Trump’s crypto venture stands to win a stake in a U.S. TikTok spin-off as part of a deal negotiated by Trump’s White House.

item.title: AI is taking on live translations. But jobs and meaning are getting lost.
item.dc:creator: Danielle Abril
item.description: New artificial intelligence-driven capabilities are expected to accelerate the shift from translation done by humans to machines.
